# RackCity - Pool Player Platform

> The #1 platform for pool and billiards players.

## What is RackCity?

RackCity is a web application for pool players to:
- Find pool halls and billiards venues near them
- Track performance stats and skill levels
- Practice with structured drills
- Get AI coaching and shot analysis
- Join leagues and tournaments
- Calculate APA handicaps

## Main Features

### Venue Finder (/venues)
Search and discover pool halls by location, table type, and amenities.

### Training (/training)
- Shot Tracker: Log accuracy by shot type (straight, cuts, banks, kicks, combos, safeties)
- Cue Ball Control: 8 progressive drills for position play

### Stats Dashboard (/stats)
- Skill level tracking (SL2-9)
- Win/loss record and streaks
- Shot accuracy breakdown
- Milestones and progress

### Strategy Guide (/strategy)
- Break patterns for 8-ball and 9-ball
- Game situation quizzes
- Tips for playing from behind

### AI Coach (/coach)
Ask pool strategy questions and get expert advice.

### Shot Analyzer (/analyzer)
Upload table photos for AI-powered shot recommendations.

### Handicap Calculator (/scoring)
APA Equalizer system with IPW (8-ball) and PPI (9-ball) calculations.

## Technology

Built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Mobile-first responsive design.

## Contact

Website: https://rackcity.app
